sentences.sContent: President Bush gave the commencement address today at the University of Notre Dame.
sentences.sCn: 布什总统今天在巴黎圣母院大学发表了毕业典礼演说。

sentences.sContent: ...Jobs suggested much the same thing during a commencement address to the graduating class atStanford University in 2005...
...Jobs ended his commencement talk with a call to innovation...
...Steve Jobs called on Stanford graduates to innovate in his commencement address...

trans.tranOther: a ceremony at which university, college, or high school students receive their  diplomas
